evidence: The Python version is not specified in the provided extracted APIs.
ElementTree is not a third-party package and does not have any version constraints.
argv was introduced in Python 2.7.14 and deprecated in Python 3.0. The other APIs are from earlier versions of the sys module and have not been removed or changed.
b64decode was introduced in Python 2.5 and deprecated in Python 3.0. The other APIs are from earlier versions of the base64 module and have not been removed or changed.
splitext was introduced in Python 2.5 and deprecated in Python 3.0. The other APIs are from earlier versions of the os module and have not been removed or changed.
StringIO is not a third-party package and does not have any version constraints.
